text: This is a list of streams and rivers in Zimbabwe. == B == Bubye River == G == Gway River == I == Inkankezi River - Insiza River - Inyankuni River == K == Kwekwe River == L == Limpopo River - Luenha River == M == Manyame River - Mazowe River - Mtshabezi River - Mtshelele River - Mucheke River - Munyati River - Mupfure River - Mushawe - Mwenezi River - Mwewe River - Mzingwane River == N == Ncema River == P == Panhane River - Pungwe River == R == Runde River == S == Save River (Africa) - Sebakwe River - Sengwa River - Shangani River - Shashe River - Siwaze River == T == Thuli River == U == Umchabezi River == Z == Zambezi River Zimbabwe Zimbabwe Category:Zimbabwe-related lists
title: List of rivers of Zimbabwe
